library:
<class name="talon_swerve_drive_controller/TalonSwerveDriveController" type="talon_swerve_drive_controller::TalonSwerveDriveController4" base_class_type="controller_interface::ControllerBase">
The SwerveDriveController tracks velocity commands. It expects Talon Controller type of hardware interfaces.
